overview: Nina Elle has been fucking Sean Michaels for a while now, and to up the thrill she decides to tie him up to a chair right in front of the door so her worthless husband can see them together as soon as he gets home. Holly Heart just hired new intern Tee Reel for a job at her company. Little does he know, the job description requires a big dick to fuck her with while her loser husband watches. Isiah Maxwell is a plumber who is trying to fix Katja Kassin's sink. Once he gets a look at her tits, he ends up working on her instead of the pipes, even if her husband is in the same room. Dava Foxx and her husband decide that he should watch Dava get fucked by her friend Jon Jon. Jon Jon is hesitant at first, but once they start kissing everything just heats up.
title: Mom's Cuckold 19
